On Mon, Apr 6, 2009 at 8:14 PM, Les Dorfman <ldorfman@...> wrote:

>   Hi Craig,
>
> I assume that 2-volume Copenhagen tsuba book is gone...
> see you in Chicago.
>
> Les
>




Les,

Alas, it sold sometime last year, now that I look at a price that would have
still been too high for you.

I was thinking about the show just yesterday, and your face popped into my
mind! I am looking forward to seeing you, and I'll try to have pictures of
the grandkids to bore you with. How's your lovely bride? She must have found
some other places to shop for you, but then again I've been lax about making
suggestions.

Take care,

Craig


--
